name: Two Tracks
description:
For more updates follow https://twitter.com/MatkaKozlik

Not finished due to deadline, but development did not stop!

Two player 2.5D coop speedrun...

Its only first screen, I failed horribly while testing online session outside of editor - in packaged game. At last I lost whole project, so this is last working version I have...

2.5D speedrun platformer. Try to finish level as fast as possible.

Players boost each other by picking up shared boosts. Both players need to open doors with interact button.


Collect shared boosters and open gates in cooperation.

Beware - debuffs are shared too

Submitting only to show I tried :)

Left/right arrow - move left/right

Space - jump

Left ctrl - roll (hold with movement arrow)

Left shift - Zoom out

E - interact with gate

P - pause music

O - next track

Num + - music volume up

Num - - music volume down

Not sure if multiplayer is working, you can at least get to first doors by starting session while alone in lobby...

Host LAN game, have another client connect. If not possible, you can play solo - host LAN game and START MATCH when alone in lobby.

If you just HOST game, STEAM subsystem is used...
